mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs Everett E. Agee
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs Everett E. Agee Offense: Threat to kill or do bodily harm Victim and Complainant: John Ratliff Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 08.22.1887 Defendant and Plaintiff each paid $6.95 for 12 months good behavior
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
Warrants (Law)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
